headline: This Biotech Stock Is Up 100% This Year. Why It’s Soaring Again Today.
summary: ImmunityBio  stock is on a tear in 2026 and it looks like the biotech company’s stellar rally will keep going.  The biotech company said full-year revenue from its bladder cancer drug ANKTIVA was set to surge 700% year-over-year to $113 million, in its preliminary earnings results Thursday.  Earlier this week Immunitybio said the Saudi Food and Drug Authority has approved ANKTIVA for the treatment of patients with non-small cell lung cancer.
